attributes.action: Issue an immediate ultimatum to the Iranian government to release our service personnel within 24 hours or face military action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our government should issue an immediate ultimatum to Iran stating that unless they release our service personnel within 24 hours we will carry out military strikes against military and economic targets in Iran.  If they fail to comply then we should hit a new target every 6 hours until they do.

Our service personnel are not political pawns they are brave sailors and marines and deserve the protection of our government.

If we fail to act now every tin pot dictator in the world will take it as a sign that it is OK to kidnap our military personnel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
